text.section: In this section, "Fund" means the Maryland Horse Industry Fund.
There is a Maryland Horse Industry Fund in the Department.

section.section: The Fund is a continuing, revolving special fund to be maintained by the State Treasurer.
The State Treasurer shall hold and the State Comptroller shall account for the Fund.

text.section: The Fund shall be invested and reinvested. Any interest or other investment earnings of the Fund shall be credited and paid into the Fund.
At the end of a fiscal year, any unspent or unencumbered balance in the Fund may not revert to the General Fund of the State.
The Board shall use the moneys in the Fund in accordance with the provisions of § 2-708 of this subtitle.
Except for the purposes in § 2-708.1 of this subtitle, the Board may not use any moneys in the Fund for any other purpose of the Board.
